fields.fieldTitle: The website you're welcoming them to
The niche group of people you target (plural)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: For Sale By Owners | FSBOs

fields.fieldTitle: What is a BIG result they want? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: Speaking directly to your audience - "I know you really want to _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sell your house yourself without an agent!

fields.fieldTitle: What is a BIG "how to" SECRET they really want to know?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: how to quickly get your house sold and save the HUGE real estate commissions

fields.fieldTitle: What bribe do they get when they opt in?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Free Video, Free Video Series, Free Report, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is Big Prize or payoff of the free bribe you're offering?

fieldHint.hint1: "We've created a [free video] for you that explains _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: the three biggest hurdles every For Sale By Owner faces AND how to overcome them

fields.fieldTitle: What is the Big takeway or "reveal" you make on the next page (sales page)?

fieldHint.hint1: "Also, on the next page you'll get all the details about _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: how you can immediately get started selling your house yourself and save the HUGE real estate commissions
